name: Garbodor
pokedex_entry: NO. 569 Trash Heap Pokémon HT: 6'3" WT: 236.6 lbs.

ability.name: Poisonous Puddle
ability.text: Once during your turn, if a Stadium is in play, you may make your opponent’s Active Pokémon Poisoned.

description: This Pokémon eats trash, which turns into poison inside its body. The main component of the poison depends on what sort of trash was eaten.
